page.title: 19Interview with Rev.Richards
page.content: The{Rev.Dan Richards}vicar,moved here with his wife(a supply teacher) and 3 young sons{from Slough}5 years ago. His home town is Bath.He finds this small rural village very different from industrial Slough with its multi-cultural population. The vicar has{5 churches}to look after in Ilchester,Yeovilton,Podimore, Limington and Northover.But{Northover is likely{to close}soon. Maybe it will then become a{museum}for all the Roman finds in Ilchester or perhaps it will be a{folk and craft centre. On average the vicar travels{50 {miles}a week visiting his churches and parishioners, but for diocesan meetings this may rise to 150 miles. Mostly the Rev. Richards uses his{car but he may be seen on his{bicycle}for local visits.Only 2 churches have {bells,}Ilchester(5) and Limington(6).
